title: 3 Pack Gym Basketball Mens Shorts - Quick Dry Black Workout Athletic Shorts with Pockets for Casual Running (S-6XL)
description: 【LIGHTWEIGHT & BREATHABLE】BOOJO athletic shorts are designed with premium polyester for softness, breathability, and stretch. These lightweight shorts offer a comfortable texture, eliminating any irritation. With quick-drying properties, they ensure cool and comfy wear for any activity.

【SECURE POCKETS & COST-EFFECTIVE】Our gym shorts offer both affordability and convenience. They feature deep, secure pockets that ensure comfortable wear and unrestricted movement. Safely store essentials like your phone, keys, or wallet, allowing you to focus on your activities

【PRACTICAL DRAWSTRING】Our men's workout shorts feature a highly elastic waistband and a practical drawstring for a secure and comfortable fit. Designed for excellent performance during lounging, exercise, or basketball, they stay in place for unparalleled comfort without slipping or sliding.

【MAXIMUM FLEXIBILITY & COMFORT】The running shorts, with a 10-inch inseam, provide maximum flexibility and comfort. Designed to minimize friction during various activities, they suit different sports. Whether in intense workouts or casual outings, enjoy the freedom and comfort our shorts offer.

【MANY OCCASIONS】The men's shorts are designed to suit a variety of activities, including basketball, lounging, casual wear, walking, sleeping, yoga, training, athletics, jogging, running, tennis, or travel. Available in a range of colors, our shorts deliver unmatched comfort while catering to your diverse style preferences.
